document.full_text: president hamid karzai ordered the release of a prominent aide two hours after his arrest on corruption charges and before the press conference detailing the charges against him.
document.title: comedy of errors in kabul as karzai aide is arrested, then released
lines_and_colors: president hamid karzai ordered the release of a prominent aide two hours after his arrest on corruption charges and before the press conference detailing the charges against him.
